answers.answer: We cant say what you have by looking at your text.  You need to see a Doctor who can look at you.  Those numbers are high lost of thing can raise BG, so see an MD.
lol im not a idiot I plan on going to the doctors I was just kinda hoping someone would have a idea as to what this is

To get clear results.. \1-Do a post prandial blood glucose test ( 2 hours after eating )2- Do a fasting blood glucose test ( 8 hours fasting  ) .get the results and see a diabetologist ,.In my openion , you may be diabetic,.
Did not mean to imply you were.183 is high, its high enough to classify you as pre-diabetic.Ask for an A1c test and a GTT test (glucose tolerance test)
ok .... Im sorry if I came off as rude im just kinda freaking out about it but thanks

question: FOR A WHILE NOW IVE BEEN HAVING A CONSTANT DRY MOUTH I DRINK ALOT OF SODA WATER GATORAID BUT IM STILL CONSTANTLY THIRSTY IVE ALSO BEEN EXPERIENCING TINGLING ON MY SCALP MY UPPER ARMS AND SIDE OF MY FACE , FATIGUE , WEAKNESS , IM NOT SURE IF IVE BEEN PEEING ALOT BECAUSE I DO DRINK QUIT A BIT , ALSO MUSCLE S SPASMS LASTNIGHT I WAS IN BED AND MY FOOT JUST JUMPED UP FOR NO REASON I GOOGLED MY SYMPTOMS AND DIABETES POPED UP LAST NIGHT I TOOK A BLOOD SUGAR TEST AND IT SAID 183 THEN ABOUT 3 HOURS LATER WITHOUT EATING ANYTHING I TOOK ANOTHER ONE AND IT SAID 132 .........  WHAT DO YOU THINK
title: NEED HELP SAP
